creditline: Gift of David Tausig Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
description: three dark wooden bowls with matte black metal cover attached to silver metal post on round base; bowls are detachable, and pivot; comes in original plastic bag and box
image_copyright: © Minol Araki%2C licensed by David Frank and Kazukuni Sugiyama
text: The Pivotray was one of PIPa’s most successful products. Made of luxurious zelkova (keyaki) wood from Japan, it continued to be distributed even after PIPa’s collapse in 1976.
title: Pivotray
